verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%>
Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%>
Dan, <S%H1835><s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H836>Asher.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H3409>loins<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H5315>souls:<s%> for <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> already.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and increased <S%H8317>abundantly,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and waxed exceeding <S%H6105>mighty;<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them.
Now there arose <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H7227>more<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> we:

Come <S%H3051><s%> on, let us deal <S%H2449>wisely<s%> with them; <S%H6435>lest<s%> they <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and it come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that, <S%H3588>when<s%> there falleth <S%H7122>out<s%> any <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H1931>they<s%> <S%H3254>join<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> our <S%H8130>enemies,<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against us, and so get them <S%H5927>up<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Therefore they did <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H8269>taskmasters<s%> <S%H4522><s%> <S%H4616>to<s%> <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them with their <S%H5450>burdens.<s%> And they <S%H1129>built<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4543>treasure<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6619>Pithom<s%> and <S%H7486>Rameses.<s%>

But the <S%H834>more<s%> they <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> them, the <S%H3651>more<s%> they <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> and <S%H3651>grew.<s%> <S%H6555><s%> And they were <S%H6973>grieved<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H853>made<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> with rigor: <S%H6531><s%>

And they <S%H853>made<s%> their <S%H2416>lives<s%> <S%H4843>bitter<s%> with <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>bondage,<s%> in <S%H2563>mortar,<s%> and in <S%H3843>brick,<s%> and in all <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5656>service,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they made them <S%H5647>serve,<s%> was with <S%H6531>rigor.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H3205>midwives,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H8236>Shiphrah,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> Puah: <S%H6326><s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> When ye do the office of a <S%H3205>midwife<s%> <S%H853>to<s%> the Hebrew <S%H5680>women,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H70>stools;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> be a <S%H1121>son,<s%> then ye shall <S%H4191>kill<s%> him: but <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> be a <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> then she shall <S%H2425>live.<s%>

But the <S%H3205>midwives<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H1696>commanded<s%> <S%H413><s%> them, but <S%H2421>saved<s%> <S%H853><s%> the men <S%H3206>children<s%> alive.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> called <S%H7121>for<s%> the <S%H3205>midwives,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H4069>Why<s%> have ye <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> and have <S%H2421>saved<s%> <S%H853><s%> the men <S%H3206>children<s%> alive?

And the <S%H3205>midwives<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the Hebrew <S%H5680>women<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> as the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H802>women;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2007>they<s%> are <S%H2422>lively,<s%> and are <S%H3205>delivered<s%> <S%H2962>ere<s%> the <S%H3205>midwives<s%> come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them.
Therefore <S%H430>God<s%> dealt <S%H3190>well<s%> with the <S%H3205>midwives:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and waxed very <S%H6105>mighty.<s%> <S%H3966><s%>
And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3205>midwives<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> that he <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H1004>houses.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> that is <S%H3209>born<s%> ye shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> into the <S%H2975>river,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> ye shall save <S%H2421>alive.<s%>
